name: 01e597ef-8943-52ca-b7e1-8174af75c6fe
notes: This is a collection of n-grams extracted from the KRES corpus of written Slovene. In addition to the separate lists of n-grams for tokens and their attributes (morphosyntacic tag, lemma), an adjusted frequency list with statistical substring reduction has also been added (as described in O'Donnell 2011). Only n-grams within sentences have been counted.
title: KRES corpus n-grams 1.0
